1.01.name: wordpress/mombly-review-rating
1.01.description:
Mombly Review Ratings allow you to easily insert ratings for your reviews on your wordpress blogs. The format to add a rating is simply just [Rating:3.5/5]. You can even use your own pictures for the stars of the ratings. There is also text support for RSS feeds. Do check out the Mombly Review Rating Plug-in Page as well.

Some features include:

  • Supports multiple ratings on any page
  • Supports text display and image display for ratings
  • Will generate text output for RSS feeds
  • Customizable text output using variables to customize output
  • Customizable images for rating stars
